name: Beef Stir-Fry
ingredients: 500g beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 1 red bell pepper, sliced, 1 green bell pepper, sliced, 1 onion, sliced, 2 cloves of garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, I tablespoon cornstarch, I tablespoon vegetable oil, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add beef slices and stir-fry until browned. Remove from the wok and set aside.
In the same wok, add garlic, bell peppers, and onion. Stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Return beef to the wok and pour in the sauce mixture.
Stir-fry for a minute until the sauce thickens and coats the ingredients.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g pancetta or bacon, 2 large eggs, 50g grated Parmesan cheese, 2 cloves garlic (optional), 2 tablespoons olive oil, Black pepper and salt to taste.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, heat olive oil and cook pancetta until crispy. Add garlic for extra flavor.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly pour the egg and cheese mixture into the pasta, stirring to coat evenly.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 500g chicken breast, cubed, 1 cup plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground turmeric, 2 teaspoons garam masala, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1 tablespoon ginger paste, 400g canned tomato puree, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, turmeric, garam masala, garlic, and ginger for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a skillet and cook the marinated chicken until browned. Set aside.
In the same skillet, add tomato puree and simmer until thickened.
Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper.
Add the chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes until fully cooked.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: 500g chicken, 2 cups basmati rice, 1 cup yogurt, 2 large onions (sliced), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 2 tablespoons ginger-garlic paste, 2 teaspoons biryani masala, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, 4-5 cloves, 2-3 cardamom pods, 1 stick cinnamon, 2 bay leaves, Saffron strands soaked in milk, Fresh coriander and mint leaves, Salt and oil to taste.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, turmeric, biryani masala, and ginger-garlic paste for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a large pan and fry the onions until golden brown. Set half aside for garnishing.
In the same pan, add cumin, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon, and bay leaves.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add marinated chicken and cook until tender.
Meanwhile, cook basmati rice until 70% done. Drain and set aside.
Layer the partially cooked rice over the chicken. Drizzle saffron milk and top with fried onions, coriander, and mint leaves.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until rice is fully cooked.
Serve hot with raita or salad.

name: Shrimp Pad Thai
ingredients: 200g rice noodles, 150g shrimp, 2 eggs, 1 cup bean sprouts, 2 green onions, sliced, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 2 tablespoons tamarind paste, 1 tablespoon sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup peanuts, chopped, Lime wedges for garnish.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft. Drain and set aside.
Heat oil in a wok and scramble the eggs. Push to one side.
Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, soy sauce, and sugar.
Stir everything together and toss with bean sprouts and green onions.
Garnish with peanuts and serve with lime wedges.

name: Vegetable Ratatouille
ingredients: 1 eggplant, diced, 1 zucchini, sliced, 1 red bell pepper, chopped, 1 onion, sliced, 2 tomatoes, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon thyme, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet and sauté garlic and onion until soft.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook until tender.
Stir in diced tomatoes, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are fully cooked.
Serve warm as a side dish or over bread.

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: 4 small corn tortillas, 200g white fish fillets, 1 cup shredded cabbage, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 lime, 1 tablespoon olive oil, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: Season fish fillets with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lime juice.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and cook fish until flaky and golden.
Warm tortillas in a pan or microwave.
Fill tortillas with fish, shredded cabbage, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve with lime wedges for extra zest.

name: Greek Moussaka
ingredients: 2 eggplants, sliced, 500g ground lamb or beef, 1 onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 400g canned tomatoes, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup béchamel sauce, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and grill until softened.
Cook ground meat, onion, and garlic until browned. Stir in tomatoes, cinnamon, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Layer grilled eggplant and meat sauce in a baking dish.
Top with béchamel sauce and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) for 25-30 minutes until golden brown.
Let it cool slightly before serving.
